mapper.select: select admin_no, admin_name, password, dept_id, available_dept_ids, role_id from ts_admin
select admin_no from ts_admin where admin_no >= all(select admin_no from ts_admin)
mapper.update: update ts_admin set available_dept_ids = #{deptIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_id = case when #{deptCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER} = 1 then 4 else 5 end where admin_no = #{adminNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
